title: Enzo Maresca: Chelsea boss refuses to explain public outburst but insists he is committed to the club | Football News | Sky Sports
snippet: Monday 15 December 2025 18:48, UK · Please use Chrome browser for a more accessible video player · Enzo Maresca affirms his commitment to Chelsea after his comments saying he’d had the ‘worst 48 hours’ at Chelsea · Chelsea head coach ...

title: Enzo Maresca - Wikipedia
snippet: By December, Chelsea were seen as potential title contenders, which Maresca played down. In the end, Maresca led Chelsea to a fourth place finish, the first time that the club qualified for the UEFA Champions League since the 2021–22 season under Thomas Tuchel.

title: List of Chelsea F.C. managers - Wikipedia
snippet: In February 2022, Thomas Tuchel led Chelsea to its first FIFA Club World Cup. He is also the coach who have won the most international titles with the club; all three of his titles were international.

title: Enzo Maresca: Chelsea boss says he is 'happy' but wounds still open after 'worst 48 hours' claim - BBC Sport
snippet: 15 December 2025 · Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca is keeping everyone guessing about exactly what he meant when he described the period before the weekend win over Everton as "the worst 48 hours" of his time in charge.

title: Chelsea Football Club is delighted to announce the appointment of Enzo Maresca as new head coach of the men’s team.
snippet: Chelsea Football Club is delighted to announce the appointment of Enzo Maresca as new head coach of the men’s team.
